app.name: Empty BTSDK App
app.description: This is an empty starter application, a starting point for adding new code and functionality. As provided, the app only outputs a trace message on initialization of the Bluetooth stack. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: WICED BTSDK Tools
app.description: This is an empty project that comes with all the WICED BTSDK Tools. It is provided as a means to obtain all the tools at once. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Sink
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of Audio Sink profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Gateway
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of Audio Gateway profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Handsfree
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of Handsfree profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Headset
app.description: This is a Headset reference application. It includes support for Audio Sink, Handsfree, and AVRC profiles. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Headset and Speaker
app.description: This is a Headset and Speaker reference application. It includes support for Audio Sink, Handsfree, and AVRC profiles. It also includes support for AAC Codec. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Record
app.description: This application demonstrates the use of on-board microphone of the WICED boards to record audio. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Audio Watch
app.description: This is a Smart Watch reference application. It includes support for Audio Source, AVRC, Audio Gateway, and Handsfree profiles. It also supports Apple AMS and ANCS. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Alert Notification Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Alert Notification Client profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Alert Notification Service
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Alert Notification Service profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Battery Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Battery Client profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Battery Service
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Battery Service profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Beacon
app.description: This application demonstrates the use of the beacon library to create Google Eddystone and Apple iBeacons advertisements. It also demonstrates the use of multi-advertisement feature. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Connection Oriented Channel
app.description: This application demonstrates the use of LE L2CAP APIs for creating Connection Oriented Channels. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Environment Sensing Temperature
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a simple BLE Environmental Sensing Profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Find Me
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a simple BLE Immediate Alert Service (IAS)-based Find Me Profile (FMP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Heart Rate Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of Heart Rate Client profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Heart Rate Service
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of Heart Rate Service profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Hello Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Vendor Specific Client sample application. Use this application along with BLE Hello Sensor application. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: BLE Hello Sensor
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of BLE Vendor Specific Server. Use this application along with BLE Hello Client application. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL ADC
app.description: This application demonstrates how to configure and use ADC in WICED Evaluation boards to measure DC voltage on various DC input channels. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL GPIO
app.description: This application demonstrates how to use WICED GPIO APIs to configure GPIO to be an input or output pin. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL I2C Master
app.description: This application demonstrates how to use I2C driver interface to send and receive bytes or a stream of bytes over the I2C hardware as a master. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL Low Power
app.description: This example demonstrates low power modes on CYW20819, CYW20820, and CYW89820 chips. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL PUART
app.description: This application demonstrates how to use PUART APIs to read data from the terminal as well as display data on terminal. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL PWM
app.description: This application demonstrates how to configure and use PWM in WICED Eval boards to control the brightness of the LEDs onboard. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL UART Raw Mode
app.description: This application demonstrates HCI UART interface configured for the Raw Data Mode. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HAL UART SPI bridge
app.description: This application implements the SPI Master and acts as a UART-SPI Bridge. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HID BLE Mouse
app.description: This is a BLE Mouse reference application based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HID BLE Remote Control
app.description: This is a BLE Remote reference application based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HID BLE Remote
app.description: This is a BLE Remote reference application based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: HID Dual Mode Keyboard
app.description: This is a BR-EDR and BLE keyboard reference application. It is based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP) for BLE keyboard and HID Device profile for BR-EDR keyboard For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Colored Light
app.description: This application demonstrates a colored light. It implements the Light HSL (Hue, Saturation, and Lightness) Server model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Dimmer
app.description: This application demonstrates a dimmer. It implements the Level Client model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Dimmer Self Config
app.description: This application demonstrates a dimmer with a self-configuration feature. This feature allows fast configuration of the device. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Embedded Provisioner
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a self-organized mesh network where one device is an embedded provisioner, and it searches for all unprovisioned devices and adds them to the network. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Dimmable Light
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a dimmable light. It is based on the Mesh Light Lightness Server model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Smart Light
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a light controller. It is based on the Mesh Light LC (Lightness Control) Server model. It can be controlled by the occupancy sensor or Light LC On/Off messages. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Low-Power LED
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a low- power LED system. It is based on the Mesh Power Onoff Server model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo On-Off Switch
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of an On-Off Switch. It is based on the Mesh Generic OnOff Client model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Motion Sensor
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a motion sensor. It is based on Mesh Sensor Server model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Temperature Sensor
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a temperature sensor. It based on the Mesh Sensor Server model. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Demo Smart Switch
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a motion sensor combined with an on-off button. It is based on the Mesh Sensor Server and Generic OnOff Server models. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Snip Battery Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a SIG BLE mesh model as indicated by the name of the application. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: Mesh Snip Battery Server
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a SIG BLE mesh model as indicated by the name of the application. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: OTA Firmware Upgrade
app.description: This is a snippet application to demonstrate the use of OTA firmware upgrade APIs and library. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: RFCOMM MAP Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of RFCOMM based Message Access Client Profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: RFCOMM OPP Server
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of RFCOMM based Object Push Server Profile. For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: RFCOMM PBAP Client
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of RFCOMM based Phone Book Access Client Profile (PBAP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: RFCOMM Serial Port
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a RFCOMM based Serial Port Profile (SPP). For more information, see the README in this link.

app.name: RFCOMM Serial Port Multi-Port
app.description: This application demonstrates the implementation of a RFCOMM based Serial Port Profile (SPP) that can support up to two SPP connections, and interfaces to an external host using WICED HCI. For more information, see the README in this link.
